name: BLED
description:
Bled, the perfect mix between Blue and Red is a little local PvP game, which is played with two players on one AZERTY keyboard.

The gameplay is inspired by super mario war :) 

(The original musics are included in the download) 

Game options

SpireStart the gameTwo TowersClic to choose map100Right click to decrease the score  goal
Left click to increase it
